subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Al Jefferson had a career-high 39 points and 15 rebounds, and the host Minnesota Timberwolves won two in a row for the first time this season by beating the Phoenix Suns, the Western Conference leader, 117-107, on Wednesday night.
snippet: Al Jefferson had a career-high 39 points and 15 rebounds, and the host Minnesota Timberwolves won two in a row for the first time this season by beating the Phoenix Suns, the Western Conference leader, 117-107, on Wednesday night.
